name: agent
content: <situation name="{SITNAME}" mapAllAttributes="Y">			<class name="{EIF_CLASS}" />			<slot slotName="msg">				<literalString value="{MSG_TM}" />   from ITM6_EIF_CLASS in CCSDB (includes variables from ITM6_CONFIG)			</slot>			<slot slotName="probe">				<literalString value="{PROBE_TM}" />  from ITM6_EIF_CLASS in CCSDB (includes variables from ITM6_CONFIG)			</slot>			<slot slotName="threshold">				<literalString value="{THRESHOLD_1}" />			</slot>			<slot slotName="profile">				<literalString value="{PROFILE}" />			</slot>		</situation>
